ref: 3755 kṣáuma ʻ prepared from linseed ʼ Suśr., ʻ made of linen ʼ Lāṭy., n. ʻ linseed ʼ Suśr., ʻ linen cloth ʼ KātyŚr., kṣaumika -- ʻ made of linen ʼ. [kṣumā -- ]
Pa. khōma -- ʻ made of flax ʼ, n. ʻ linen cloth or garment ʼ,
Pk. khōma -- , ˚aga -- ʻ made of flax ʼ, n. ʻ linen or cotton or silk cloth ʼ, khōmiya -- ʻ made of flax or cotton or silk ʼ; M
B. khũye ʻ a coarse sort of silk ʼ;
Si. komu ʻ fine cloth of goat's hair ʼ.
